title: Get hands-on with ArcBox
shortDescription: Use ArcBox to deploy an Azure Arc sandbox in less than an hour.
detailsDescription: See more contextual details about what happens with this solution and why this is useful and why a user should use it.

highlights.content: Use Azure Arc to extend your non-Azure infrastructure into Azure.
ArcBox deploys a Hyper-V host with guest virtual machines and enables them as Arc-enabled servers.
ArcBox is great for training, demos, testing, and exploration.
Also includes the option to deploy a virtual machine as an Azure Arc-enabled SQL server.
